actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Forests and Public Land Management

official_title: A bill to validate certain conveyances made by the Southern Pacific Transportation Company within the city of Reno, Nevada and for other purposes.

summary.text: Validates the conveyances of certain real properties from the Southern Pacific Transportation Company, or its subsidiaries, predecessors, successors, or assigns: (1) on or before January 1, 1995; and (2) after January 1, 1995, to the redevelopment agency of the city of Reno, Nevada. Reserves to the United States any federally-owned mineral rights in such lands.

titles.title: A bill to validate certain conveyances made by the Southern Pacific Transportation Company within the city of Reno, Nevada and for other purposes.
